com.junk.application

Class RandomKeyGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.junk.application.RandomKeyGenerator

  • public class RandomKeyGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
    A class for generating random character sequence.
    to generate a random string RandomChar rc = new RandomChar(); System.out.println(rc.generate(RandomChar.Type.DIGITS_LETTERS_UPPERLOWERCASE,20));
    so ez right?

    • Method Detail

      • generateByPattern

        public java.lang.String generateByPattern(java.lang.String pattern)
        Generates a random string from a pattern.
        for example if want to generate a String like 4Nu40-J91vIw6-0720
        so basically the pattern is [iXcii-XiixXxi-iiii]
        escape char for :x,:X,:i c stands for lowercase character,C stands for uppercase character
        and i stands for integer
        Parameters:
        pattern - the pattern e.g [iXxii-XiixXxi-iiii]
        Returns:
        the generated random key based on pattern

      • generate

        public java.lang.String generate(RandomKeyGenerator.Type type,
                                 int size)
        returns a generated random strings based on
        size and type.
        Parameters:
        size - the size
        type - the type of generation
        Returns:
        the generated random sequence
